text: Year 41 BC was either a common year starting on Wednesday or Thursday or a leap year starting on Tuesday, Wednesday or Thursday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Antonius and Vatia. == Events == * In the Perusine War the city of Sentinum is captured and destroyed by Quintus Salvidienus Rufus. * Mark Antony meets Cleopatra VII. They form an alliance. == Births == * Gaius Asinius Gallus Saloninus, consul under Caesar Augustus (d. AD 33) == Deaths == * Arsinoe IV of Egypt Category:40s BC
title: 41 BC
